entries.comment: SFX playback rate scale (set during sfx_play; affected by Reflex Boost).

entries.comment: UI button struct array (stride 0x18) used by ui_button_update.

entries.comment: UI button struct array (stride 0x18) used by ui_button_update.

entries.comment: Config: music disabled flag (1 disables music init).

entries.comment: Config: high-score duplicate handling (1 replaces existing entry).

entries.comment: Config: player count (loop bound in per-player logic).

entries.name: config_player_mode_flags

entries.comment: Config: aim scheme selector (value 4 enables analog aim axis).

entries.comment: Config: player name buffer (char[12]) copied on load; limited usage so far.

entries.comment: Config: player name (copied to runtime player_name on load).

entries.comment: Config: display color depth (bits per pixel).

entries.comment: UI pulse timer in ms (used for sine-based effects).

entries.comment: Credits line table: pointer slots (interleaved with flags, stride 8 bytes).

entries.comment: Credits secret UI button state for Reset (ui_button_update target).
entries.name: credits_secret_reset_button

entries.comment: Credits secret match mask array (horizontal set 0, per-cell -3 on match).

entries.comment: Credits secret match mask array (vertical set 0, per-cell -3 on match).
entries.name: credits_secret_match_mask_v0

entries.comment: Credits secret match mask array (vertical set 1, per-cell -3 on match).
entries.name: credits_secret_match_mask_v1

entries.comment: Credits secret UI button state for Back (ui_button_update target).
entries.name: credits_secret_back_button

entries.comment: Credits secret flags; bit0 initializes Reset button, bit1 initializes Back button.
entries.name: credits_secret_flags

entries.comment: Modal/plugin interface pointer used when game_state_id == 0x16.
entries.name: plugin_interface_ptr

entries.comment: Credits secret countdown timer in ms (adds 2000 on match, reset to 0x2580).

entries.name: credits_secret_anim_time_ms

entries.comment: Credits secret score counter displayed as "score: %d".

entries.comment: Creature type table: texture handle (stride 0x44 bytes).
entries.name: creature_type_texture

entries.comment: Quest spawn table entry count (used by quest_spawn_timeline_update).
entries.name: quest_spawn_count

entries.comment: Quest metadata table base (0x2c-byte entries, 0x32 total).
entries.name: quest_selected_meta

entries.comment: Quest time limit in ms (quest_selected_meta + 0x08, stride 0x2c).
entries.name: quest_meta_time_limit_ms

entries.comment: Terrain texture index (layer A) used by terrain_generate (quest_selected_meta + 0x10, stride 0x2c).
entries.name: quest_meta_terrain_id

entries.comment: Terrain texture index (layer B) used by terrain_generate (quest_selected_meta + 0x14, stride 0x2c).
entries.name: quest_meta_terrain_id_b

entries.comment: Terrain texture index (layer C) used by terrain_generate (quest_selected_meta + 0x18, stride 0x2c).
entries.name: quest_meta_terrain_id_c

entries.comment: Current quest builder function pointer (runs quest script).
entries.name: quest_selected_builder

entries.comment: Quest unlock perk id field (quest_selected_meta + 0x20, stride 0x2c). Used by perks_rebuild_available.
entries.name: quest_unlock_perk_id

entries.comment: Quest unlock weapon id field (quest_selected_meta + 0x24, stride 0x2c). Used by weapon_refresh_available.
entries.name: quest_unlock_weapon_id

entries.comment: Quest starting weapon id (quest_selected_meta + 0x28, stride 0x2c). Applied in quest_start_selected.
entries.name: quest_start_weapon_id

entries.comment: Camera offset X applied to world positions for rendering.
entries.name: camera_offset_x

entries.comment: Camera offset Y applied to world positions for rendering.
entries.name: camera_offset_y

entries.comment: Spawn slot owner creature pointer (stride 0x18 bytes; indexed by creature_link_index).
entries.name: creature_spawn_slot_owner

entries.comment: Spawn slot current count (stride 0x18 bytes; indexed by creature_link_index).
entries.name: creature_spawn_slot_count

entries.comment: Bonus metadata enabled flag (bonus_meta_label + 0x0c); id 0 is disabled.
entries.name: bonus_meta_enabled

entries.comment: Status file blob (0x268 bytes). Header stores quest_unlock_index (low u16) + quest_unlock_index_full (high u16).
entries.name: game_status_blob

entries.comment: Quest play/attempt counters (u32[?]); indexed by quest_stage_major * 10 + quest_stage_minor.
entries.name: quest_play_counts

entries.comment: Saved game sequence id loaded from registry.
entries.name: game_sequence_id

entries.comment: Quest spawn table base (entries used by quest_spawn_timeline_update).
entries.name: quest_spawn_table

entries.comment: Survival handout gate (set on reset; cleared after reward or after 3 death samples).
entries.name: survival_reward_handout_enabled

entries.comment: Pending perk picks; incremented on level-up and decremented on perk selection.
entries.name: perk_pending_count

entries.comment: Perk choice refresh flag; set when perks change and cleared after perks_generate_choices runs.
entries.name: perk_choices_dirty

entries.comment: Shock Chain link counter; decremented on each chained hit.
entries.name: shock_chain_links_left

entries.comment: Projectile index for the active Shock Chain segment.
entries.name: shock_chain_projectile_id

entries.comment: Survival spawn cooldown accumulator (counts down to next burst).
entries.name: survival_spawn_cooldown

entries.comment: Plaguebearer infection kill counter (used to cap contagion spread).
entries.name: plaguebearer_infection_count

entries.comment: Active creature count (set each creature_update_all pass).
entries.name: creature_active_count

entries.comment: Quest spawn timeline (elapsed ms for quest triggers).
entries.name: quest_spawn_timeline

entries.comment: Tutorial stage timer (ms) used for fade/auto-advance.
entries.name: tutorial_stage_timer

entries.comment: Set when the player fires; gates survival weapon rewards (cleared when 3 deaths recorded).
entries.name: survival_reward_fire_seen

entries.comment: Set on player damage; gates survival weapon rewards.
entries.name: survival_reward_damage_seen

entries.comment: Survival reward tracking: recent creature death X positions (3 entries, stride 8 bytes).
entries.name: survival_recent_death_pos_x

entries.comment: Survival reward tracking: recent creature death Y positions (3 entries, stride 8 bytes).
entries.name: survival_recent_death_pos_y

entries.comment: Survival reward tracking: recent creature death counter (counts to 6, stores 3 positions).
entries.name: survival_recent_death_count

entries.comment: Quest stage major index (episode/tier). Initialized to 1 in FUN_004120b0; advances after every 10 minor stages; not persisted to disk.
entries.name: quest_stage_major

entries.comment: Quest stage minor index (mission within major tier). Initialized to 1 in FUN_004120b0; incremented on quest results "Play Next"; not persisted to disk.
entries.name: quest_stage_minor

entries.comment: Creature pool active flag cached by creatures_none_active().
entries.name: creatures_any_active_flag

entries.comment: Demo/attract mode flag; disables HUD and alters update behavior.

entries.comment: Time-scale active flag (set while Reflex Boost is active).
entries.name: time_scale_active

entries.comment: Time-scale factor applied to frame dt when Reflex Boost is active.
entries.name: time_scale_factor

entries.comment: Global Weapon Power Up timer (bonus id 4).
entries.name: bonus_weapon_power_up_timer

entries.comment: Max quest unlock index (u16). Updated on quest completion; used to unlock perks/weapons; saved in game_status_blob.
entries.name: quest_unlock_index

entries.comment: Full-version quest unlock index (u16). Saved in game_status_blob; gated by config_full_version.

entries.comment: Nonzero while bonus/perk effects spawn projectiles; skips bonus drop logic.

entries.comment: Active high score record buffer (0x48 bytes).

entries.comment: Survival elapsed time (ms); stored in high score record offset 0x20.

entries.comment: High score record game mode (offset 0x28), set from config_game_mode.

entries.comment: High score record most-used weapon id (offset 0x2b).

entries.comment: High score record shots hit count (offset 0x30).
entries.name: highscore_record_shots_hit

entries.comment: Total creature kills (incremented on creature death paths); stored in high score record offset 0x34.

entries.comment: High score record flags (offset 0x44); bit0 gates save/load, bit1 marks replaced entries, bit2 marks display-selected entries.

entries.comment: UI mouse blocking flag checked by ui_mouse_inside_rect.
